TCName.name: SalesColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N')) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSalesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as PLN_SLS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSalesWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as PLN_SLS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is TCName.BudgetSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_SALES_DTSZ,0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.BudgetSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSZ,0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ForecastSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_SALES_DTSZ,0) as FCST_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ForecastSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSZ,0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no

TCName.PastWeekLYsales: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct TCName.PastWeekAllowedWages:
select src.ar_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ > src.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) * (PST_FACTOR_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ < src.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) * (NGT_FACTOR_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ * ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_DTSZ from
(select actl_sls.ar_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_DTSZ,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_DTSZ, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from
(select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_DTSZ,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_DTSZ from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.ar_no=bdgt_wge_pct.ar_no order by actl_sls.ar_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.ar_no
TCName.PastWeekAllowedWagesTotal:
select src.zone_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ > src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) * (PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ < src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) * (NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ * ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from
(select actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from
(select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no order by actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS),0) as ACTL_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from TCName.CurrentWeekActualSalesWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and TCName.CurrentWeekLYsales: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and TCName.CurrentWeekLYSalesTotal: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select select src.ar_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ > src.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) * (PST_FACTOR_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ < src.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_DTSZ) * (NGT_FACTOR_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ * ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_DTSZ from
(select actl_sls.ar_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_DTSZ,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_DTSZ, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from

d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_DTSZ,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_DTSZ from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.ar_no=bdgt_wge_pct.ar_no order by actl_sls.ar_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekAllowedWagesTotal:
select src.zone_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ > src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) * (PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ < src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ - BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ) * (NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ * ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from
(select actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from
(select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.fcst_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls /* where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_TOT_DTSZ from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no order by actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.zone_no

TCName.name: ItemsColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedItems: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, TCName.PastWeekLYItems: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 TCName.PastWeekVarItemsWkToDtTotal: select pln.zone_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_ITM_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct zone_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N')) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no) pln, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,ROUND((x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun),0) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_ITM_DTS) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_itm_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_itm_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and TCName.CurrentWeekActualItems: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_ITM_DTS),0) as ACTL_ITM_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select TCName.CurrentWeekActualItemsWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as ACTL_ITM_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and
