TCName.CurrentWeekLYItems: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_ITM_DTS) as ACTL_ITM_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as TCName.CurrentWeekLYItemsTotal: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, TCName.CurrentWeekVarItemsWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_ITM_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,ROUND((x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun),0) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select TCName.PlannedCustomers: select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(sls.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(sls.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(sls.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(sls.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(sls.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(sls.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_CUST_cnt) as PLN_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no

TCName.PastWeekActualCustomersWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as ACTL_CUST_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' TCName.PastWeekLYCustomers: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Tue, TCName.PastWeekLYCustomersTotal: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and TCName.PastWeekVarCustomersWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_CUST_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Tue, TCName.CurrentWeekActualCustomersWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as ACTL_CUST_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' TCName.CurrentWeekLYCustomers: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_CUST_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_CUST_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by TCName.CurrentWeekLYCustomersWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((cyly_wtd.cy_wtd / cyly_wtd.ly_wtd)-1)*100,2) END as LYPCT_CUST_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select cy_val.zone_no,sum(cy_val.ACTL_CUST_CY_TOT_DTSZ) as cy_wtd,sum(ly_val.ACTL_CUST_LY_TOT_DTSZ) as ly_wtd from TCName.CurrentWeekVarCustomersWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_CUST_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_CUST_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_CUST_DTS),0) as PLN_CUST_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_CUST_cnt) as PLN_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_CUST_cnt) as PLN_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_CUST_cnt) as PLN_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_CUST) as GEN_CUST_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.fcst_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls /* where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no

TCName.name: WagesColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedWagesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_DTS,0),0) as PLN_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by wge.ar_no
TCName.PlannedWagesWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG,0),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.BudgetWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_WAGES_DTSZ,0) as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WAGES_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_WAGES_TOT_DTSZ,0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WAGES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_WAGES_DTSZ,0) as FCST_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_wage_amt),0) as FCST_WAGES_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_WAGES_TOT_DTSZ,0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_wage_amt),0) as FCST_WAGES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),0) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.ar_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PastWeekActualWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.zone_no,g.ar_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualWagesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.ar_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(j.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) f /* UNION select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) g UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as TCName.PastWeekLYWages: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ from b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.loc_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='LYWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl_ly where actl_cy.ar_no=actl_ly.ar_no order by actl_cy.ar_no
TCName.PastWeekLYWagesTotal: select actl_cy.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_cy, (select TCName.PastWeekLYWagesWkToDt: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_ly.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.cy_wtd / actl_ly.ly_wtd)-1)*100,2) END as LYPCT_WGE_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ as cy_wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.ar_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(j.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) f /* UNION select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.ar_no order by b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) i */) j group by j.zone_no order by j.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) estd_fcst, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_WAGES_TOT_DTSZ,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_wage_amt),0) as FCST_WAGES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) bdgt_wge where estd_fcst.zone_no=bdgt_wge.zone_no order by estd_fcst.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekEstimatedFcstWage: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,0),0) as ESTD_FCST_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and TCName.CurrentWeekActualWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),0) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and TCName.CurrentWeekActualWagesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by wge.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualWagesWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by wge.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekLYWages: select actl_cy.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Mon,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Mon,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Fri / actl_ly.Fri)-1)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sat,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sat,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sat / actl_ly.Sat)-1)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Sun,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Sun,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Sun / actl_ly.Sun)-1)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Mon / actl_ly.Mon)-1)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Tue,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Tue,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Tue / actl_ly.Tue)-1)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Wed,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Wed,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Wed / actl_ly.Wed)-1)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Thu,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(actl_ly.Thu,0) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((actl_cy.Thu / actl_ly.Thu)-1)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 and NVL(actl_ly.Fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_cy.Fri,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN TCName.CurrentWeekLYWagesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0
