a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) bdgt_wge where estd_fcst.zone_no=bdgt_wge.zone_no order by estd_fcst.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekEstimatedFcstWage: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,0),0) as ESTD_FCST_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekEstimatedFcstWageTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0),0) as ESTD_FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no

TCName.name: HoursColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedHours: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS),2) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS),2) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedHoursWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS,2),0) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedHoursWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG,2),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualHours: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),2) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as TCName.PastWeekActualHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) TCName.CurrentWeekActualHours: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),2) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.ar_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */ ) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),2) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /* UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.ar_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualHoursWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualHoursWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarHoursWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_HRS_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS,2),0) as wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) pln, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ,2),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no order by pln.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarHoursWkToDtTotal: select pln.zone_no,(actl.wtd - pln.wtd) as VAR_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG,2),0) as wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DTG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DTG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) pln, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,2),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no

TCName.name: CPHColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedCPH: select wge_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select z.ar_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Mon_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Tue_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Wed_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Thu_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Fri_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Sat_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Sun_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Mon_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Tue_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Wed_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Thu_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Fri_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Sat_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Sun_hrs from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DTSZ,sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.ta_pln_wage_amt!=0 and a.ta_pln_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.ar_no
TCName.PlannedCPHTotal: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select z.zone_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Mon_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Tue_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Wed_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Thu_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Fri_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Sat_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Sun_wge, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Mon_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Tue_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Wed_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Thu_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Fri_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Sat_hrs, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Sun_hrs from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.ta_pln_wage_amt!=0 and a.ta_pln_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on z.zone_no=y.zone_no order by z.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PlannedCPHWkToDt: select wge_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSZ / wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ),2),0) END as PLN_CPH_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,wge.PLN_WGE_DTSZ as PLN_WGE_DTSZ,wge.PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WGE_DTSZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.ar_no
TCName.PlannedCPHWkToDtTotal: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ / wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ),2),0) END as PLN_CPH_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,ROUND(wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,wge.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualCPH: select wge_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Thu_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Fri_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sat_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sun_hrs from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),9) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),9) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on lc.ar_no=y.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.ar_no

wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon_hrs, lc.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualCPHWkToDt: select wge_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.ar_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Thu_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Fri_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sat_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ)),0) Sun_hrs from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),9) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),9) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on lc.ar_no=y.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualCPHTotal: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.mon_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.mon_wge / wge_hrs.mon_hrs),2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.tue_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.tue_wge / wge_hrs.tue_hrs),2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wed_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wed_wge / wge_hrs.wed_hrs),2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.thu_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.thu_wge / wge_hrs.thu_hrs),2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.fri_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.fri_wge / wge_hrs.fri_hrs),2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sat_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sat_wge / wge_hrs.sat_hrs),2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.sun_hrs,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.sun_wge / wge_hrs.sun_hrs),2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,y.Mon_wge,y.Tue_wge,y.Wed_wge,y.Thu_wge,y.Fri_wge,y.Sat_wge,y.Sun_wge,y.wtd_wge, y.Mon_hrs,y.Tue_hrs,y.Wed_hrs,y.Thu_hrs,y.Fri_hrs,y.Sat_hrs,y.Sun_hrs,y.wtd_hrs from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_wge + x.Tue_wge + x.Wed_wge + x.Thu_wge + x.Fri_wge + x.Sat_wge + x.Sun_wge) as WTD_wge, (x.Mon_hrs + x.Tue_hrs + x.Wed_hrs + x.Thu_hrs + x.Fri_hrs + x.Sat_hrs + x.Sun_hrs) as WTD_hrs from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun_wge, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat_hrs, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun_hrs from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),9) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),9) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and b.ar_no='Area' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on lc.zone_no=y.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualCPHWkToDt: select wge_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wtd_wge / wge_hrs.wtd_hrs),2),0) END as ACTL_CPH_WTD_DTSZ from (select wge.ar_no,wge.WTD_WGE,hrs.WTD_HRS from (select lc.ar_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ as WTD_WGE from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,wge.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ as WTD_HRS from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) hrs where wge.ar_no=hrs.ar_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualCPHWkToDtTotal: select wge_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_wge,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.wtd_hrs,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.wtd_wge / wge_hrs.wtd_hrs),2),0) END as ACTL_CPH_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select wge.zone_no,wge.wtd_wge,hrs.wtd_hrs from (select lc.zone_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ as WTD_WGE from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select TCName.CurrentWeekVarCPHWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,ROUND(actl.wtd - pln.wtd,2) as VAR_CPH_WTD_DTSZ from (select wge_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge_hrs.PLN_WGE_DTSZ / wge_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ),2),0) END as WTD from (select lc.ar_no,wge.PLN_WGE_DTSZ as PLN_WGE_DTSZ,wge.PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by (select lc.zone_no,wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ as WTD_HRS from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) hrs where wge.zone_no=hrs.zone_no order by wge.zone_no) wge_hrs order by wge_hrs.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no

TCName.name: WagesPercentageColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedWagesPercentage: select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,sls.mon,sls.tue,sls.wed,sls.thu,sls.fri,sls.sat,sls.sun from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by wge.ar_no

sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DTSZ))
