NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.BudgetWagePercentage: select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGEPCT_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,bdgt.BDGT_WAGE_DTSZ as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,bdgt.BDGT_SALES_DTSZ as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by wge.ar_no
TCName.BudgetWagePercentageTotal: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,bdgt.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_DTSZ as BDGT_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,bdgt.BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSZ as BDGT_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SALES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWagePercentage: select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_DTSZ / sls.FCST_SLS_DTSZ)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGEPCT_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,fcst.FCST_WAGE_DTSZ as FCST_WGE_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,fcst.FCST_SALES_DTSZ as FCST_SLS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by wge.ar_no
TCName.ForecastWagePercentageTotal: select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ / sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,fcst.FCST_WAGE_TOT_DTSZ as FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,fcst.FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSZ as FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.frcst_sls) as FCST_SALES_TOT_DTSZ from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualWagesPercentage: select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ)) Sat, / sls.mon)*100,2) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2) END as Tue, TCName.CurrentWeekActualWagesPercentageWkToDt: select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100,2),0) END as ACTL_WGEPCT_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,0) as WTD from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls /* where (pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarWagesPrecentage: select estd_fcst.ar_no,ROUND((estd_fcst.ACTL_WGE_PRCNT_DTSZ - bdgt.BDGT_WGEPCT_DTSZ),2) as BDGT_VAR_WGEPCT_DTSZ from (select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100,2),0) END as ACTL_WGE_PRCNT_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSZ as WTD from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,sls.wtd as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_SLS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and order by b.ar_no) x ) z) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no) estd_fcst, (select wge.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_DTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_DTSZ)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGEPCT_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WGE_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and and lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls) as BDGT_SLS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm from b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no and lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where TCName.CurrentWeekVarWagesPrecentageTotal: select estd_fcst.zone_no,ROUND((estd_fcst.ACTL_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ - bdgt.BDGT_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ),2) as BDGT_VAR_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100,2),0) END as ACTL_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.fcst_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.pln_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls /* where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) estd_fcst, (select wge.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ / sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGEPCT_TOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,sum(fcst.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WGE_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,sum(fcst.frcst_sls) as FCST_SLS_TOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no) fcst where estd_fcst.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by estd_fcst.zone_no

TCName.name: SMSColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedSMS: select lc.ar_no,nvl(sms.mon,0) as mon,nvl(sms.tue,0) as tue,nvl(sms.wed,0) as wed,nvl(sms.thu,0) as thu, nvl(sms.fri,0) as fri,nvl(sms.sat,0) as sat,nvl(sms.sun,0) as sun from (select distinct ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSG from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSMSTotal: select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.mon,0) as mon,nvl(sms.tue,0) as tue,nvl(sms.wed,0) as wed,nvl(sms.thu,0) as thu, nvl(sms.fri,0) as fri,nvl(sms.sat,0) as sat,nvl(sms.sun,0) as sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSMSWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSG from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSMSWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualSMS: select e.ar_no, NVL(sms_src.mon,0) as MON,NVL(sms_src.tue,0) as TUE,NVL(sms_src.wed,0) as WED,NVL(sms_src.thu,0) as THU,NVL(sms_src.fri,0) as FRI,NVL(sms_src.sat,0) as SAT,NVL(sms_src.sun,0) as SUN from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no , round(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) mon, round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) tue, round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) wed, round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) thu, round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) fri, round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) sat, round(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )),2) sun from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by e.ar_no

TCName.PastWeekVarSMSWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ - pln.PLN_SMS_WTD_DTSZ) as VAR_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSG from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) pln, (select e.ar_no,nvl(actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt,0) as ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no order by pln.ar_no
TCName.PastWeekVarSMSWkToDtTotal: select pln.zone_no,(actl.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ - pln.wtd) as VAR_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln, (select 'STORE TOTAL' as Totl,sum(actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt) as ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by TCName.CurrentWeekActualSMS: select lc.ar_no, NVL(ROUND(xy.Monday,2),0) as mon,NVL(ROUND(xy.Tuesday,2),0) as tue,NVL(ROUND(xy.Wednesday,2),0) as wed,NVL(ROUND(xy.Thursday,2),0) as thu, NVL(ROUND(xy.Friday,2),0) as fri,NVL(ROUND(xy.Saturday,2),0) as sat,NVL(ROUND(xy.Sunday,2),0) as sun from (select distinct ar_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.ar_no,sum(xyz.monday) as Monday,sum(xyz.tuesday) as Tuesday,sum(xyz.wednesday) as Wednesday,sum(xyz.thursday) as Thursday, sum(xyz.friday) as Friday,sum(xyz.saturday) as Saturday,sum(xyz.sunday) as Sunday from (select * from (select ar_no, NVL(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Monday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Tuesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Wednesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Thursday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Friday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Saturday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy /* UNION select * from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and (b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) */) xyz group by xyz.ar_no order by xyz.ar_no) xy on lc.ar_no=xy.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualSMSTotal: select lc.zone_no, NVL(ROUND(xy.Monday,2),0) as mon,NVL(ROUND(xy.Tuesday,2),0) as tue,NVL(ROUND(xy.Wednesday,2),0) as wed,NVL(ROUND(xy.Thursday,2),0) as thu, NVL(ROUND(xy.Friday,2),0) as fri,NVL(ROUND(xy.Saturday,2),0) as sat,NVL(ROUND(xy.Sunday,2),0) as sun from (select distinct zone_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.zone_no,sum(xyz.monday) as Monday,sum(xyz.tuesday) as Tuesday,sum(xyz.wednesday) as Wednesday,sum(xyz.thursday) as Thursday, sum(xyz.friday) as Friday,sum(xyz.saturday) as Saturday,sum(xyz.sunday) as Sunday from (select * from (select zone_no, NVL(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Monday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Tuesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Wednesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Thursday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Friday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Saturday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no order by zone_no) xy /* UNION select * from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where TCName.CurrentWeekActualSMSWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.ar_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select * from (select ar_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy UNION select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and TCName.CurrentWeekVarSMSWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ - pln.PLN_SMS_WTD_DTSZ) as VAR_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and
