a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and (b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no)) xyz group by xyz.ar_no order by xyz.ar_no) xy on lc.ar_no=xy.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no order by pln.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarSMSWkToDtTotal: select pln.zone_no,(actl.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ - pln.PLN_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ) as VAR_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,nvl(sms.wtd,0) as PLN_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSR from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct zone_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.zone_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select * from (select zone_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no order by zone_no) xy UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no)) xyz group by xyz.zone_no order by xyz.zone_no) xy on lc.zone_no=xy.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no

TCName.name: ORColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedOR:
select sms_hrs.ar_no, case when sms_hrs.mon=0 and pln_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.mon / pln_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when sms_hrs.tue=0 and pln_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.tue / pln_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as tue, case when sms_hrs.wed=0 and pln_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wed / pln_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as wed, case when sms_hrs.thu=0 and pln_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.thu / pln_hrs.thu)*100,1),0) end as thu, case when sms_hrs.fri=0 and pln_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.fri / pln_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as fri, case when sms_hrs.sat=0 and pln_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sat / pln_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as sat, case when sms_hrs.sun=0 and pln_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sun / pln_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as sun from
(select lc.ar_no,sms.mon,sms.tue,sms.wed,sms.thu,sms.fri,sms.sat,sms.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS),2) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by pln_hrs.ar_no
TCName.PlannedORTotal:
select sms_hrs.zone_no, case when sms_hrs.mon=0 and pln_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.mon / pln_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when sms_hrs.tue=0 and pln_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.tue / pln_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as tue, case when sms_hrs.wed=0 and pln_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wed / pln_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as wed, case when sms_hrs.thu=0 and pln_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.thu / pln_hrs.thu)*100,1),0) end as thu, case when sms_hrs.fri=0 and pln_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.fri / pln_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as fri, case when sms_hrs.sat=0 and pln_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sat / pln_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as sat, case when sms_hrs.sun=0 and pln_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sun / pln_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as sun from
(select lc.zone_no,sms.mon,sms.tue,sms.wed,sms.thu,sms.fri,sms.sat,sms.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ)) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS),2) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no order by sms_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PlannedORWkToDt: select sms_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as PLN_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by pln_hrs.ar_no
TCName.PlannedORWkToDtTotal: select sms_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as PLN_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,ROUND(sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS),2) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no order by sms_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualOR: select actl_sms.ar_no, case when actl_sms.mon=0 and actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when actl_sms.mon=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.mon / actl_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when actl_sms.Tue=0 and actl_hrs.Tue=0 then 0 when actl_sms.Tue=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.Tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Tue / actl_hrs.Tue)*100,1),0) end as Tue, case when actl_sms.Wed=0 and actl_hrs.Wed=0 then 0 when actl_sms.Wed=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.Wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Wed / actl_hrs.Wed)*100,1),0) end as Wed, case when actl_sms.Thu=0 and actl_hrs.Thu=0 then 0 when actl_sms.Thu=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.Thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Thu / actl_hrs.Thu)*100,1),0) end as Thu, case when actl_sms.Fri=0 and actl_hrs.Fri=0 then 0 when actl_sms.Fri=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.Fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Fri / actl_hrs.Fri)*100,1),0) end as Fri, case when actl_sms.Sat=0 and actl_hrs.Sat=0 then 0 when actl_sms.Sat=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.Sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Sat / actl_hrs.Sat)*100,1),0) end as Sat, case when actl_sms.Sun=0 and actl_hrs.Sun=0 then 0 when actl_sms.Sun=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.Sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Sun / actl_hrs.Sun)*100,1),0) end as Sun from (select e.ar_no,(sms_src.Monday) as Mon,(sms_src.Tuesday) as Tue,(sms_src.Wednesday) as Wed,(sms_src.Thursday) as Thu,(sms_src.Friday) as Fri, (sms_src.Saturday) as Sat,(sms_src.Sunday) as Sun from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.ar_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_hrs where actl_sms.zone_no=actl_hrs.zone_no order by actl_sms.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekActualORWkToDt: select actl_sms.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ)*100,1),0) END as ACTL_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no) actl_sms LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) f /* UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) g UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) i */) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no)actl_hrs on actl_hrs.ar_no=actl_sms.ar_no order by actl_sms.ar_no
TCName.PastWeekActualORWkToDtTotal: select actl_sms.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ)*100,1),0) END as ACTL_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select zone_no,sum(actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt) as ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no) group by zone_no order by zone_no)actl_sms, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.zone_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(j.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select h.zone_no,h.loc_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.loc_no order by h.zone_no,h.loc_no) f /* UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) g UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) i */) j group by j.zone_no order by j.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no)actl_hrs where actl_sms.zone_no=actl_hrs.zone_no order by actl_sms.zone_no
TCName.PastWeekVarORWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.ACTL_OR_WTD_DTSZ - pln.PLN_OR_WTD_DTSZ) as VAR_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select sms_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)*100,1),0) END as PLN_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS,0) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by pln_hrs.ar_no) pln, (select actl_sms.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ)*100,1),0) END as ACTL_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no) actl_sms LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) f /* UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt TCName.PastWeekVarORWkToDtTotal: select pln.zone_no,(actl.ACTL_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ - pln.PLN_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ) as VAR_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select sms_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as PLN_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,ROUND(sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS),2) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no order by sms_hrs.zone_no) pln, (select actl_sms.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ)*100,1),0) END as ACTL_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select zone_no,sum(actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt) as ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,round(Sum(plan_sms_hrs),2) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no ='Division' where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no) group by zone_no order by zone_no)actl_sms, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and NOT NULL and a.actl_hrs!=0) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) i */) j group by j.zone_no order by j.zone_no) wge on TCName.CurrentWeekActualOR: select sms.ar_no, case when NVL(sms.mon,0)=0 and NVL(krn.mon,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.mon,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.mon,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.mon / krn.mon)*100,1) end as MON, case when NVL(sms.tue,0)=0 and NVL(krn.tue,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.tue,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.tue,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.tue / krn.tue)*100,1) end as TUE, case when NVL(sms.wed,0)=0 and NVL(krn.wed,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.wed,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.wed,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.wed / krn.wed)*100,1) end as WED, case when NVL(sms.thu,0)=0 and NVL(krn.thu,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.thu,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.thu,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.thu / krn.thu)*100,1) end as THU, case when NVL(sms.fri,0)=0 and NVL(krn.fri,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.fri,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.fri,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.fri / krn.fri)*100,1) end as FRI, case when NVL(sms.sat,0)=0 and NVL(krn.sat,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.sat,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.sat,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.sat / krn.sat)*100,1) end as SAT, case when NVL(sms.sun,0)=0 and NVL(krn.sun,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.sun,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.sun,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.sun / krn.sun)*100,1) end as SUN from (select lc.ar_no, NVL(xy.Monday,0) as mon,NVL(xy.Tuesday,0) as tue,NVL(xy.Wednesday,0) as wed,NVL(xy.Thursday,0) as thu, NVL(xy.Friday,0) as fri,NVL(xy.Saturday,0) as sat,NVL(xy.Sunday,0) as sun from (select distinct ar_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.ar_no,sum(xyz.monday) as Monday,sum(xyz.tuesday) as Tuesday,sum(xyz.wednesday) as Wednesday,sum(xyz.thursday) as Thursday, sum(xyz.friday) as Friday,sum(xyz.saturday) as Saturday,sum(xyz.sunday) as Sunday from (select * from (select ar_no, NVL(Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Monday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Tuesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Wednesday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Thursday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Friday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Saturday, NVL(sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , ACTL_SMS_DTSZ )),0) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy /* UNION src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select order by lc.ar_no) sms, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy UNION select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and (b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no)) xyz group by xyz.ar_no order by xyz.ar_no) xy on lc.ar_no=xy.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sms, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by
