(select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) krn where sms.ar_no=krn.ar_no order by sms.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekActualORWkToDtTotal: select sms.zone_no, case when NVL(sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(krn.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ / krn.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ)*100,1) end as ACTL_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct zone_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.zone_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select * from (select zone_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no order by zone_no) xy UNION b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) krn where sms.zone_no=krn.zone_no order by sms.zone_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarORWkToDt: select pln.ar_no,(actl.ACTL_OR_WTD_DTSZ - pln.PLN_OR_WTD_DTSZ) as VAR_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select sms_hrs.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_DTSZ)*100,1),0) END as PLN_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS,0) as PLN_HRS_DTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by pln_hrs.ar_no) pln, (select sms.ar_no, case when NVL(sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(krn.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ / krn.ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ)*100,1) end as ACTL_OR_WTD_DTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_SMS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.ar_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select * from (select ar_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by ar_no order by ar_no) xy UNION select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and (b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no)) xyz group by xyz.ar_no order by xyz.ar_no) xy on lc.ar_no=xy.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sms, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HRS_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTD_DTSZ from (select distinct ar_no,'Store Total' as STR_TOT from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.ar_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.ar_no order by actl_pln.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) krn where sms.ar_no=krn.ar_no order by sms.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no order by pln.ar_no
TCName.CurrentWeekVarORWkToDtTotal: select pln.zone_no,(actl.ACTL_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ - pln.PLN_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ) as VAR_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select sms_hrs.zone_no, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as PLN_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS),2) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,ROUND(sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_DTS),2) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no order by sms_hrs.zone_no) pln, (select sms.zone_no, case when NVL(sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(krn.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(krn.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms.ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ / krn.ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ)*100,1) end as ACTL_OR_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_SMS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct zone_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' order by zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select xyz.zone_no,sum(xyz.ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select * from (select zone_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSZ) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select distinct src.*, (CASE When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSZ from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20,85,27,28) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by zone_no order by zone_no) xy UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DTSZ from (select e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.fin_yr='Year' and c.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and dy.day_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.wk_id,dy.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.wk_id,src.day_of_wk from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) src where dept_no NOT IN (20,85,27,28)) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no)) xyz group by xyz.zone_no order by xyz.zone_no) xy on lc.zone_no=xy.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sms, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTDTOT_DTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select actl_pln.zone_no,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSZ,sum(actl_pln.ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte<=trunc(sysdate-1) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WAGE_DTSZ,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HOURS_DTSZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.dly_wage_dte>=trunc(sysdate) and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g ) actl_pln group by actl_pln.zone_no order by actl_pln.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) krn where sms.zone_no=krn.zone_no order by sms.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no order by pln.zone_no
